EmailTemplate.description: This Template is used to notify Agency users after Cat Finance submits Unilever target base fees
EmailTemplate.name: AF_Notification_Agency_HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Brand "{!AF_Brand_Estimate__c.Brand__c}" available for completion of Base Fee inputs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Agency User
Brand "{!AF_Brand_Estimate__c.Brand__c}" is available for completion of Base Fee inputs in connection with the "{!AF_Brand_Estimate__c.AF_Basefee_Estimate_Initial_Quarter__c} {!AF_Brand_Estimate__c.AF_Fiscal_Year__c}" Purchase Order.
Please log into the Agency Fees application using the link below to submit your full year estimates.
{!AF_Brand_Estimate__c.AF_Community_Link__c}
From "{!AF_Brand_Estimate__c.Brand__c}" Finance Team
